GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, which can be sorted by any valid column name (default: created_at), and where the order can be set to asc (default: desc)

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object representing the article with the requested ID

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: accepts an object with the required property of inc_votes, set to a positive or negative number, increments the votes value for the requested article and serves an object representing the updated article with the votes property updated

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of objects that represent the comments for the article with the requested ID

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: accepts an object with the required properties of 'body' and 'username', where username refers to an existing user, and serves an objects that represents the comment added to the the article with the requested ID

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment with the provided ID and responds with status 204 and no response body

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
